P

parseSongLines(String) - Static method in class jlyrics.datatypes.SongLyrics
Parses the specified lyrics into lines, where lines are assumed to be segmented by line breaks.
parseSongLyrics(String) - Static method in class jlyrics.LyricsFeatureProcessor
Searches through the specified directory and its sub-directories in order to find all files with the ".txt" extension.
parseSongSegments(String) - Static method in class jlyrics.datatypes.SongLyrics
Parses the specified lyrics into segments (e.g.
parseTextFile(String) - Static method in class jlyrics.datatypes.SongLyrics
Parses a text file in order to extract lyrics from it.
parseUniqueWords(String) - Static method in class jlyrics.datatypes.SongLyrics
Finds all of the unique words in the specified lyrics and counts how often they occur.
parseWords(String) - Static method in class jlyrics.datatypes.SongLyrics
Finds all of the words in the specified lyrics and returns them separated out into an array with one entry per word.
populateFeatureExtractorsToApply() - Static method in class jlyrics.LyricsFeatureProcessor
Return the set of features to extract from lyrics data.
prepareFeatureDescriptions(LyricsFeatureExtractor[]) - Static method in class jlyrics.LyricsFeatureProcessor
Return ACE FeatureDefinition objects for each of the features to be extracted.
prepareFeatureValues(SongLyrics[], LyricsFeatureExtractor[], double[][][]) - Static method in class jlyrics.LyricsFeatureProcessor
Return ACE DataSet objects for all of the extracted features.
printContents() - Method in class jlyrics.datatypes.SongLyrics
Prints the contents of this object to standard out.
